skill.name: 31 Knots of Justice
descriptions: When assigned to a fleet with 3 DDs: gives your fleet +1 tile movement on the map.
When assigned as the Command Cat to a fleet that has at least 1 DD: 15.0% chance to launch a preemptive torpedo strike when engaging any non-Boss fleet on the map.

When assigned as the Command Cat to a fleet that isn't in combat and has at least 1 DD: adds an option in the Strategy Menu to switch positions with a friendly fleet in combat if it is directly adjacent to yours.
opsi_descriptions: When assigned to a fleet with 3 DDs: increases your Vanguard's TRP by a moderate amount based on the Tactics stat.
When assigned as the Command Cat, and when the 2nd ship in your Vanguard is a DD: fires a Lv. 1 special barrage.
Improves the special barrage to Lv. 2.

skill.name: Snipurr
descriptions: When engaging an enemy Vanguard or Main Fleet: increases the Accuracy of your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by a large amount based on the Tactics stat.
When assigned to a fleet with a BB, BC, or BBV as its Flagship: increases the DMG the Flagship deals based on the Directives stat.
Increases EVA and AA for your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by a moderate amount based on the Directives stat.
opsi_descriptions: When engaging an enemy Vanguard or Main Fleet: increases the Accuracy of your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by a large amount based on the Tactics stat.
When assigned to a fleet with a BB, BC, or BBV as its Flagship: increases the DMG the Flagship deals based on the Directives stat.
Increases EVA and AA for your BBs, BCs, and BBVs by a moderate amount based on the Directives stat.

skill.name: Bite Their Fingers
descriptions: When assigned as the Command Cat to a fleet that has at least 1 DD: 15.0% chance to launch a preemptive torpedo strike when engaging any non-Boss fleet on the map.
Once per battle, when a DD is the frontmost ship of your Vanguard: activates Meowfficer Barrage I when in close proximity to an enemy.
Upgrades Meowfficer Barrage I to Meowfficer Barrage II.
opsi_descriptions: When assigned as the Command Cat: increases your DD's TRP by a small amount based on the Directives stat.
Once per battle, when a DD is the frontmost ship of your Vanguard: activates Meowfficer Barrage I when in close proximity to an enemy.
Upgrades Meowfficer Barrage I to Meowfficer Barrage II.

descriptions: When assigned as the Staff Cat: increases the RLD of your CVs and CVLs by a small amount based on the Tactics stat.
When the fleet runs into an Airstrike on the map: gives a chance to completely evade the Airstrike based on the Tactics stat.
When assigned as the Staff Cat: increases the AVI of your CVs and CVLs by a moderate amount based on the Directives stat.
